text: Big Brother 17 is the seventeenth season of various versions of television show Big Brother and may refer to: * Big Brother 17 (U.S.), the 2015 edition of the U.S. version * Big Brother 17 (UK), the 2016 edition of the UK version * Gran Hermano 17, the 2016 edition of the Spanish version * Big Brother Brasil 17, the 2017 edition of the Brazilian version
title: Big Brother 17
